TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemBindingCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemBindingCollection Inherits StateManagedCollection
public ref class MenuItemBindingCollection sealed : System::Web::UI::StateManagedCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理控件中对象的集合。 The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控件使用类作为其属性的数据类型。 The control uses the class as the data type for its property. 属性用于存储为控件定义的任何菜单项绑定。 The property is used to store any menu item bindings defined for the control. > [!NOTE] > 对象在集合中的显示顺序对这些对象如何应用于控件中的菜单项没有任何影响。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. 类支持多种方法来访问集合中的项:The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引器直接检索特定的从零开始的索引处的对象。 Use the indexer to directly retrieve the object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法可创建一个可用于循环访问集合的枚举器。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法可将集合的内容复制到数组中。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an array. 可以通过添加和删除 对象以编程方式管理对象。You can programmatically manage a object by adding and removing objects. 若要向集合中添加菜单项, 请使用或方法。To add menu items to the collection, use the or the method. 若要从集合中删除节点, 请使用、或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , the , or the method. 类包含的属性和方法可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。The class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要确定集合中有多少项, 请使用属性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果要确定集合是否包含某个对象, 请使用方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要获取集合中对象的索引, 请使用方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式填充对象。The following code example demonstrates how to populate a object declaratively. 要使此示例正常工作, 必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 .Map 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/CS/menubindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/VB/menubindingsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将对象添加到对象。The following code example demonstrates how to add objects to a object programmatically. 要使此示例正常工作, 必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 .Map 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd/CS/menuitembindingcollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionAdd/VB/menuitembindingcollectionaddvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous examples. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将指定的对象追加到集合的末尾。 Use the method to append the specified object to the end of the collection. > [!NOTE] > 您可以向集合添加 null 值和重复的对象。You can add null values and duplicate objects to the collection. 作为替代方法, 可以使用方法在集合中的特定索引处插入对象。As an alternative, you can insert a object in the collection at a specific index by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 对象在集合中的显示顺序对这些对象如何应用于控件中的菜单项没有任何影响。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将对象追加到控件集合的末尾。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a object to the end of the collection of a control. 要使此示例正常工作, 必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 .Map 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可确定对象是否包含在集合中。 Use the method to determine whether a object is contained in the collection. 此方法通常用于在执行任务之前测试对象是否存在, 例如添加或删除集合中的菜单项绑定。This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a menu item binding from the collection.

summary.span: 从目标数组的指定索引开始，将 对象中的所有项复制到 对象的一维兼容数组。

span.span: Copies all the items from the object to a compatible one-dimensional array of objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将集合的内容复制到指定的从零开始的数组。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array. 从目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项。Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array. 使用数组时, 可以使用数组语法来访问对象中的项。With the array, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the object. 作为替代方法, 还可以使用方法来创建可用于访问集合中的项的枚举器。As an alternative, you can also use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将对象从集合复制到数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from the collection to an array. 然后循环访问该数组以显示对象的属性。The array is then iterated through to display the properties of the objects. 要使此示例正常工作, 必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 .Map 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionCopyTo/CS/menuitembindingcollectioncopytocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingCollectionCopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionCopyTo/VB/menuitembindingcollectioncopytovb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可确定集合中指定对象的索引。 Use the method to determine the index of the specified object in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 对象在集合中的显示顺序对这些对象如何应用于控件中的菜单项没有任何影响。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. 如果菜单项绑定不在集合中, 则该方法将返回-1。If the menu item binding is not in the collection, the method returns -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的菜单项绑定在集合中多次出现, 则返回第一个匹配项的索引。If the specified menu item binding appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来确定集合中对象的索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine the index of a object in the collection. 要使此示例正常工作, 必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 .Map 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding binding) cil managed

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可从集合中移除指定的菜单项绑定。Use the method to remove the specified menu item binding from the collection. 然后, 在该菜单项之后的所有项上移以填充空白位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 已移动项的索引也会更新。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 集合可以包含 null 值和重复的对象。The collection can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 作为替代方法, 可以使用方法从集合中的特定索引移除菜单项。As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the method. 你还可以使用方法从集合中删除所有菜单项。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 对象在集合中的显示顺序对这些对象如何应用于控件中的菜单项没有任何影响。The order in which objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法从集合中删除对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove a object from the collection. 要使此示例正常工作, 必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 .Map 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionRemove/CS/menuitembindingcollectionremovecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingCollectionRemove/VB/menuitembindingcollectionremovevb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``
